mapper.select: SELECT tb3.blog_id,tb3.blog_title,tb3.blog_content,tb3.create_time,tb3.name,tb3.type_name,tb3.cnumber,tb3.bnumber from(SELECT * from (SELECT b.*,u.name,bt.type_name from bloginfo b,userinfo u,blog_type bt,user_blog ub WHERE b.blog_id = ub.blog_id and ub.user_id = u.user_id and b.bt_id = bt.bt_id and b.blog_id = 1 ) tb1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT blog_id bid,COUNT(blog_id) as cnumber from comment1 where blog_id = 1) tb2 on tb1.blog_id = tb2.bid LEFT JOIN (SELECT blog_id bid2,COUNT(blog_id) as bnumber from browse where blog_id = 1) tb4 on tb1.blog_id = tb4.bid2 ) tb3

bt.type_name = #{type_name} and bt.blog_id = b.blog_id

SELECT tb3.blog_id,tb3.blog_title,tb3.blog_content,tb3.create_time,tb3.name,tb3.type_name,tb3.cnumber,tb3.bnumber from(SELECT * from (SELECT b.*,u.name,bt.type_name from bloginfo b,userinfo u,blog_type bt,user_blog ub WHERE b.blog_id = ub.blog_id and ub.user_id = u.user_id and b.bt_id = bt.bt_id and bt.type_name = #{type_name} ) tb1
LEFT JOIN (SELECT c.blog_id bid ,COUNT(c.blog_id) as cnumber from comment1 c,blog_type bt,bloginfo b where b.blog_id = c.blog_id and bt.type_name = #{type_name} and b.bt_id = bt.bt_id GROUP BY bid) tb2 on tb1.blog_id = tb2.bid
LEFT JOIN (SELECT br.blog_id bid2,COUNT(br.blog_id) as bnumber from browse br,blog_type bt,bloginfo b where b.blog_id = br.blog_id and bt.type_name = #{type_name} and b.bt_id = bt.bt_id GROUP BY bid2) tb4 on tb1.blog_id = tb4.bid2 ) tb3
